author: kevin
msg: Install header files.
configure.in add install-include to the INSTALL_RULES variable.
Thanks to Garret Rooney <rooney@electricjellyfish.net> for pointing out that
this no longer works, and Yoshiki Hayashi <yoshiki@xemacs.org> for pointing out
why.

author: sussman
msg: Complete task #485.
* main.c (main):  new svnadmin 'setlog' subcommand, so we can change
log messages after the fact.

author: joe
msg: Remove unnecessary casts.

author: cmpilato
msg: Before:  Any working copy update over DAV that called for the addition
of a new file or directory which had a node property set would result
in RA_DAV's XML validator whining.
After:  It's alright, Baby, new nodes have props, too. :-)
* fetch.c
(validate_element): Allow "fetch-props" XML directive inside of
"add-file" and "add-directory" parent tags (instead of only inside
"replace-file" and "replace-directory").

author: sussman
msg: Trying to fix issue #484 -- failed updates shouldn't be leaving dead
txns on the server.
* update.c (dav_svn__update_report): when an error happens building
the txn, or during the editor drive, be sure to call
svn_repos_abort_report().  This will remove the dead txn.
